lines: amit kee umr pachchees ke aasapaas thee
kad dev kee tarah lamba tha
poora chhah phut
svaasthy kee drshti se vah ikahare badan ka tha lekin kaam mein atyadhik chust
ghar mein sabase chhota tha lekin har baat mein sabase aage
aur ghar vaale use rakhate bhee sabase aage the kyonki vahee ek aisa tha jo apanee kamaee ka har paisa bejhijhak apane parivaar par kharch kar deta tha
bade bhaee usake opheesar the lekin amit se apanee jarooraten pooree karavaate the
kya ramesh kya dev aur kya sabase bade bhaee karnal mohan kumaar
amit kaaphee achchha kama leta tha apane vyaapaar mein
thekedaaree ka dhandha tha usaka
iseelie amit kee ghar bhar mein poochh thee
aur yahee kaaran tha ki amit aaj bhee deharaadoon aaya hua tha
use isee se khushee ho jaatee thee ki sabhee usaka mahatv samajhate hain
paisa to haath ka mail hai kismat bhee achchhee hai phir kharch karane kee paravaah kise
shaayad yahee kaaran tha usakee dariyaadilee ka aur iseelie vah din doonee raat chaigunee tarakkee kar raha tha
usakee tarakkee se sabhee khush the kyonki sabhee kee jarooraton ka vah dhyaan rakhata tha
amit baahar hee khada raha pramod ke saath jab sabhee bheetar chale gae
prem ne un donon ko bhee kaha tha bheetar aane ko lekin ve apanee baaton mein itane talleen the ki bheetar jaana bhee bhool gae
pramod dev ka abhinn mitr tha
vah bhee laikcharaar tha yoonivarsitee mein
donon ne ek saath peeechadee kee thee
unakee dostee kee jad itanee majaboot thee ki sabhee ko unase eeshya hotee thee
dev va pramod ek doosare ke poorak the
aur alagalag rahate hue bhee yoonivarsitee mein kabhee unhen kisee ne akele ghoomate nahin dekha
jab dekho saathasaath
raat der se hee donon bichhudate the
pramod jabaki vivaahit tha
lekin usaka vivaahit jeevan bhee raat das baje ke baad shuroo hota tha aur subah das baje tak chalata tha
is beech pramod ghar rahata tha
shesh samay yoonivarsitee mein dev ke saath padhaana risarch va ghoomana sab ek saath
haan chhuttee ke din un donon ke saath komal hotee thee
komal yaani pramod kee patnee
aaj lekin vah nahin aa sakee thee unake saath
ek tarah se maalatee use laana nahin chaahatee thee kyonki komal usakee eeshya ka paatr thee
dev kee chahetee bhaabhee ka darja maalatee bhaabhee ke bajaay komal ko jo mila hua tha
so amit doktar saahab aaj bandh gae
pramod ne amit ke kandhe par apane haath tikaate hue kaha
vah dev ko hamesha doktar saahab kahata tha
haan aur ab shaadee bhee jaldee ho jaanee chaahie
amit bhee khush tha
khush isalie ki usane ek arse baad dev ko khush dekha tha
dev phaalatoo bolata bhee kahaan tha
ghar bhar mein thodee ramesh kumaar ke saath baat karata tha vah bhee jab vah chhuttee aata tha aur thodee bahut baatacheet amit ke saath karata tha
shesh samay ghar mein bhee apanee kitaabon mein talleen rahata tha
amit ke saath vah thoda ghanisht hua tha apanee beemaaree ke dauraan
tab dev ne paaya ki amit ne usake kasht ke pal ko usake saath saha hai
dev maheena bhar aspataal raha tab bhee amit raatadin usake saath raha
usase pahale bhee dev jahaanjahaan jaata tha amit hee saaye kee tarah saath jaata tha
beemaaree ke baad yoonivarsitee tak bhee amit dev ko chhodane jaata raha
isee kaaran dev amit ko pramod ke baraabar paata tha
amit abhee pramod se kuchh aur kahane hee ja raha tha ki usakee nigaahen baahar get kee taraph uth gaeen
saamane se ek ladakee aa rahee thee
amit us ladakee ko ekatak dekhata rah gaya
aaha kitanee sundar hai yah ladakee
amit ne use apanee aankhon mein utaara
pramod kee upasthiti mein usane us ladakee se najaren chura leen
lekin tab tak pramod bhee us ladakee ko dekh chuka tha
amit kumaar jee
kahaan kho gae hain
usane amit kee manahsthiti bhee bhaanp lee thee
lekin amit ne ekadam nakaaraatmak svar mein kaha dheere se kaheen bhee nahin kisee ko dekhana gunaah to nahin
har kisee ka dekhane ka andaaj alag hota hai
pramod ne phir halke lahaje mein kaha
vah ladakee tab tak bheetar ja chukee thee
chalo ham bhee andar chalate hain
pramod ne kaha aur bheetar jaane ko hua
abhee ruk jao
amit ke man mein chor tha jisako prakat kar hee baitha vah
kyon kaheen vah ladakee yah na samajh le ki tum usake peechhepeechhe bheetar aae ho
pramod ne usake man kee baat kah dee
phir bola  paagal dekh lo jaan lo kisakee sahelee hai
achchhee lagee to kaam badee aasaanee se ban jaega
aur pramod ke saath amit ko bhee bheetar jaana pada
tab tak us ladakee ka dev se parichay ho chuka tha aur vah dev ke paas baithee thee
un donon ke bheetar jaate hee dev ne unako us ladakee ka parichay diya ki vah veena kee chhotee bahan hai prem se chhotee aur geeta se badee priya
priya priya amit ke man ne aavaaz lagaee
usakee priya usane priya kee taraph palabhar ke lie dekha vah tab hans rahee thee khilakhilaakar geeta kee koee baat sunakar
amit ne usee khilakhilaahat ko man mein bitha liya
dev vahaan se bandh kar ja raha tha aur amit kisee ko man mein bitha kar
kavita kee paktiyaan banaakar gunaguna raha tha amit
bina baat kie mulaakaat kie palakon mein kaun bas jaata hai aankhon mein sapane ban kar kaun raataraat muskaata hai
ghar bhar mein har koee khush tha veena kee shaadee pakkee ho jaane kee khabar sunakar
ek maheene mein hee sab kuchh hone ja raha tha
abhee aath din pahale to baat pakkee huee thee aur aaj taareekh bhee nikaal lee thee
bees din baad veena kee shaadee thee
ladake
vaale to chaahate the aur bhee jaldee ho jae lekin pannaalaal ke lie yah itana saral nahin lag raha tha
unhen lag raha tha ki dherasee taiyaariyaan karanee hain vah sab ve bees din mein kaise pooree kar sakenge
ladake vaalon ne unhen vishvaas dilaaya tha ki unhen kisee cheez kee aavashyakata nahin hai
ve sirph ladakee chaahate hain  sirph apane ladake kee dulhan
na baindabaaja na baaraat bas saadagee se vivaah
lekin nirmala ne is par etaraaj kiya tha
suneeta kee shaadee to unhen bilaasapur jaakar karanee padee thee isalie unake kaee shauk poore hue bina rah gae the
veena kee shaadee mein vah poora dhoomadhadaaka dekhane kee laalasa lie thee
unhen buree nahin lagee yah baat ki ladake vaale baaraat lekar nahin aaenge
unhen keval yahee akhara ki chaahe ve ghar ke log hee aaen lekin baindabaaja jaroor saath ho baaraat jaroor saje itanee hee saadagee se ho yah vivaah
haan veena kee shaadee honee thee is ghar mein
nae ghar kee pahalee shaadee
yah ghar pannaalaal ne liya tha apane ritaayar ho jaane ke baad
jab yah tay ho gaya tha ki ve ab parivaar sahit deharaadoon hee saital honge
shuroo se hee bachchon kee shiksha yaheen huee thee
naukaree ke dauraan unhen dooradoor rahana pada apane parivaar se lekin nirmala bachchon ke prati maanbaap donon ka kartavy yahaan rah kar nibhaatee rahee
dherasee kathinaeeyaan aaeen unakee raah mein lekin sab ka saamana karane ka saahas vah jutaatee raheen
bandhee huee aay mein apane parivaar ka kharch chalaaya bade suchaaru roop se nirmala ne
usakee saadh thee usake sab bachche achchhee shiksha grahan karen usee ke lie usane apane sab shauk apane se door rakhe
bachapan mein bahut shauk the nirmala ke
ghar bhar kee ikalautee ladakee
pita kee dher saaree jameen jaayadaad
kisee cheez kee ghar mein kamee nahin thee
dinabhar idhar se udhar ghoomatee rahatee
jo
pharamaeesh karatee kabhee maan kabhee pita kabhee bade bhaee pooree karane ko aatur rahate
shakl se jitanee sundar thee akl bhee utanee hee achchhee paee thee usane
padhane mein bhee badee tej thee
lekin yah sab ka sab badal gaya ekadam
pita nahin rahe
chal base ekaek beemaaree mein
ghar kee aamadanee ruk gaee
jo thodee bahut aay thee usamen maan ne apana pet kaatakar bachchon ko padhaana jaaree rakha
lekin bali ka bakara banee nirmala
bachchon mein ladakon kee padhaee jyaada jarooree samajhakar usakee padhaee rok dee gaee chhathee kaksha ke baad
bahut roee thee nirmala
usake shikshak bhee ghar par chalakar aaye the
yahee kahane ki use kasbe mein jaane diya jae ve usakee phees maaph karava denge
lekin maan nahin bata sakee unhen ki phees ke alaava bhee baakee kharche hain jo chaarachaar bachchon ke lie poore karana unake bas kee baat nahin
nirmala kee padhaee chhoot gaee aur vah ghar par rahakar apanee maan ke kaamon mein haath bataane lagee
maan ne ghar rahate use silaeekadhaee sab sikha dee
abhee ek hee varsh aur beeta tha ki maan beemaar pad gaee
usake bachane kee ummeed bhee na rahee
maan ko laga vah ab nahin bachegee
aise mein use nirmala kee chinta sataane lagee
beemaaree ke saathasaath yahee sochakar ghulatee rahatee thee ki usake baad nirmala ka kya hoga
ladake to apane ko svayan sambhaal lenge lekin use kaun sambhaalega
aur aise mein maan ko ek hee raasta sujhaee diya nirmala ka vivaah
abhee vah pandrah saal kee thee lekin samay ke lihaaj se vah umr vivaah yogy hee thee
aur aise mein pannaalaal ka rishta aaya
vah vidhur tha
umr mein nirmala se pandrah varsh bada
lekin maan ne aisa kuchh nahin socha
apanee betee ke yogy var maana use vah vakt nahin ganvaana chaahatee thee aur na hee aur achchha parivaar usake saamarthy mein tha bas jhatapat shaadee racha dee usane nirmala kee
pahalepahal to nirmala ko bahut atapata laga tha lekin jald hee usake kishoraaman ne ek praudh ka roop dhaaran kar liya tha
pannaalaal bhee usaka bahut dhyaan rakhata tha
samay ke saathasaath usakee santaanen hueen
tab nirmala ko laga ki vah apane bachapan ke sapane in santaanon ke maadhyam se poora karegee
usakee maan use nahin padha sakee lekin vah apanee ladakiyon ko khoob padhaegee
vah jo karana chaahengee usake lie har saadhan jutaegee
chaahe use bhookhe kyon na rahana pade
iseelie pannaalaal kee tanakhvaah ka mukhy bhaag to bachchon kee padhaee mein aur doosaree jarooraten pooree karane mein chala jaata tha
lekin nirmala ke sanyam aur aatmavishvaas ka usake bachchon par bhee asar pada
kisee par bhee samay ke badalate svaroop ka asar nahin pada
sabhee ko apanee seemit aarthik dasha ka gyaan tha aur kisee ne maan ko kisee baat ke lie pareshaan nahin kiya
aise mein pannaalaal jab ritaayar hone ko aae tab tak keval suneeta ka hee vivaah ho saka tha
haan veena aur rajanee apanee padhaee pooree karake kendriy vidyaalay mein adhyaapikaen lag chukee theen

aur tab pannaalaal ne nirmala ke jor dene par apanee bachchiyon kee shaadee kee chinta ke badale ritaayarament par milee grechayutee kee rakam se deharaadoon mein apane lie ek achchha sa makaan le liya
nirmala ka ek varshon se sanjoya svapn poora ho gaya
bachchon ko bhee apane nae ghar mein jaane kee khushee thee
pannaalaal ritaayar hone ke baad ghar nahin baitha
usane ek lokal pharm mein naukaree kar lee thee
ghar kee jarooraten sabhee pahale se hee seemit theen aur usakee tanakhvaah se ghar bhar ka kharch chal raha tha
veena va rajanee donon kee tanakhvaah baink mein jaatee thee
haan donon bahanen apanee chhotee bahanon kee sabhee jarooraton ka dhyaan rakhatee theen
prem is beech beeesasee pooree karake phauj mein bhartee ho gaya tha
abhee lephtinent tha
jo kuchh bhee bachata tha vah maan ko saump deta tha
aise mein veena kee shaadee kee adhik chinta nahin thee nirmala ko
usane apane lie achchhee rakam jod lee thee aur saath mein ladaka bhee aisa mila tha jisakee koee maang nahin thee
shaadee saadagee se honee thee lekin nirmala apane pahachaan vaale sabhee logon ko aamantrit karana chaahatee thee
ghar mein ek tadakabhadak ka utsav manaana chaahatee thee
iseelie usane ladake vaalon ko kaha tha baindabaaje ke saath aane ko
